amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that General David H. Petraeus, Commanding General, Multi-National Forces-Iraq, deserves the full support of the Senate and strongly condemn personal attacks on the honor and integrity of General Petraeus and all the members of the United States Armed Forces.

action.text: Amendment SA 2808 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2808.

Amendment SA 2808 proposed by Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S11356-11358, S11359-11364, S11370-11373; text: CR S11356) To express the sense of the Senate that General David H. Petraeus, Commanding General, Multi-National Forces-Iraq, deserves the full support of the Senate and strongly condemn personal attacks on the honor and integrity of General Petraeus and all the members of the United States Armed Forces.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2808 proposed by Senator Cornyn.
